name: Yash Singhal
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

full_output.summary: Results-oriented web developer with strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative approach, seeking opportunities for professional growth in a dynamic environment.

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: Food Delivery Platform
projects.description: Developed a fully functional food ordering website to enable users to browse menu, manage their cart, and checkout. Used React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Stripe API for payments. Designed and implemented the frontend using React, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly interface. Built and maintained RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, integrating with MongoDB for data storage.

projects.name: Blogging Platform
projects.description: Developed a blogging site where users can register, write, edit, and comment on posts. Used React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Heroku for deployment. Demonstrates CRUD operations, user authentication, and deployment skills.

experiences.description: Developed proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript through hands-on training and projects. Designed and implemented a fully functional calculator using JavaScript and created a registration page utilizing HTML forms and CSS for user input validation.

full_output.name: Yash Singhal
